summary: "The Sound of Music" is a popular 1965 musical movie set in Austria. It's about a woman named Maria who becomes a governess for seven children and later marries their father, Captain von Trapp. The family escapes Austria during a dangerous time in history. The movie is based on a true story and was a huge success, making lots of money and winning many awards, including Best Picture at the Oscars. It's still loved by many people around the world.
title: The Sound of Music (film)
